name: War Never Ends
description:
You have to fight a group of terrorists.
They are saying that humanity is like the
ouroboros, we are killing each other like
how the snake is eating it's self.
They want to cause even more destruction
in order to make us stop killing each other.
Stop them!

Controls:
Movement: WASD
Fire: left mouse button
Aim: right mouse button
Pull slide / load magazine: R
Magazine release: F
Change magazine: mouse wheel
Skip intro: enter

Everything was made in the jam by me.
There was meant to be a forest level and an
inside the building level, but they got cut.
